text: aur ye log mutafarriq hue bhee to ilm (haq) aa chukane ke baad aur (vah bhee) mahaz aapas kee zid se aur agar tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraf se ek vakte muqarrar tak ke lie (qayaamat ka) vaayada na ho chuka hota to unamen kabaka phaisala ho chuka hota aur jo log unake baad (khuda kee) kitaab ke vaaris hue vah usakee taraph se bahut sakht shubahe mein (pade hue) hain
